narration.utterances: Itabidi uniletee
wanyama watatu wakali na wa kipekee Nyamae alijibu
chui mwenye meno makali kama mkuki nyigu anayewauma watu na nyoka anayewameza watu

text.sentence: "Itabidi uniletee wanyama watatu wakali na wa kipekee", Nyamae alijibu, "chui mwenye meno makali kama mkuki, nyigu anayewauma watu, na nyoka anayewameza watu."
